room_title: Escape room "The Outlaw of El Paso" by Portal Escape Rooms in Eugene
review: This is a top of the line escape room! You feel truly immersed in the theme in every room. It was so fun! It's was like being on a movie set. Loved The Outlaw of El Paso escape room and can't wait to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Outlaw of El Paso" by Portal Escape Rooms in Eugene
review: We had a blast at the western-themed room! The staff was friendly and the experience was phenomenal! I cannot wait to try the other rooms! Great group activity, well done!

room_title: Escape room "The Outlaw of El Paso" by Portal Escape Rooms in Eugene
review: Done several escape rooms so far at different locations and Portal escape rooms is by far our favorite. We just did the wild west room, it was incredibly immersive and enough puzzles in each room to make sure everyone in the room always had something to do. We will be back to do all of the other rooms they have and any new ones they may bring.
